manzils.text: 50|1|qaaf. shapath hai aadaraneey quraan kee
50|2|balki unhen aashchary hua ki aa gaya unake paas ek saavadhaan karane vaala, unheen me se. to kaha kaafiron neh ye to bade aashchary[1] kee baat hai.
50|3|kya jab ham mar jaayenge aur dhool ho jaayenge (to punah jeevit kiye jaayenge)? ye vaapasee to door kee baat[1] (asambhav) hai.
50|4|hamen gyaan hai jo kam karatee hai dharatee unaka ansh tatha hamaare paas ek surakshit pustak[1] hai.
50|5|balki unahonne jhuthala diya saty ko, jab aa gaya unake paas. isalie ulajhan mein pade hue hain.
50|6|kya unhonne nahin dekha aakaash kee or apane oopar ki kaisa banaaya hai hamane use aur sajaaya hai usako aur nahin hai usamen koee daraad
50|7|tatha hamane dharatee ko phailaaya aur daal diye usamen parvat tatha upajaayee usamen pratyek prakaar kee sundar vanaspatiyaan.
50|8|aankh kholane tatha shiksha dene ke lie, pratyek allaah kee or dhyaanamagn bhakt ke lie.
50|9|tatha hamane utaara aakaash se shubh jal, phir ugaaye usake dvaara baag tatha ann, jo kaate jaayen.
50|10|tatha khajoor ke oonche vrksh, jinake guchchhe guthe hue hain.
50|11|jeevika ke lie bhakton kee tatha hamane jeevit kar diya nirjeev nagar ko. isee prakaar (tumhen bhee) nikalana hai.
50|12|jhuthalaaya isase pahale nooh kee jaati tatha kuven ke vaasiyon evan samood ne.
50|13|tatha aad aur firaun evan loot ke bhaeeyon ne.
50|14|tatha aika ke vaasiyon ne aur tubb[1] kee jaati ne. pratyek ne jhuthalaaya[2] rasoolon ko. antatah, sach ho gayee (unapar) hamaaree dhamakee.
50|15|to kya ham thak gaye hain pratham baar paida karake? balki, ye log sandeh mein pade hue hain naye jeevan ke baare mein।
50|16|jabaki hamane hee paida kiya hai manushy ko aur ham jaanate hain jo vichaar aate hain usake man mein tatha ham adhik sameep hain usase (usakee) praananaadee[1] se.
50|17|jabaki[1] (usake) daayen-baayen do farishte likh rahe hain.
50|18|vah nahin bolata koee baat, magar use likhane ke lie usake paas ek nireekshak taiyaar hota hai.
50|19|aa pahunchee maut kee achetana (be hoshee) saty lekar. ye vahee hai, jis se too bhaag raha tha.
50|20|aur phoonk diya gaya soor (narasingha) mein. yahee yaatana ke vachan ka din hai.
50|21|tatha aayega pratyek praanee is dasha mein ki usake saath ek haankane[1] vaala aur ek gavaah hoga.
50|22|too isee se achet tha, to hamane door kar diya tera parda, to teree aankh aaj khoob dekh rahee hai.
50|23|tatha kaha usake saathee[1] neh ye hai, jo mere paas taiyaar hai.
50|24|donon (farishton ko aadesh hoga ki) phenk do narak mein pratyek kaafir (saty ke) virodhee ko.
50|25|bhalaee ke rokane vaale, adharmee, sandeh karane vaale ko.
50|26|jisane bana lie allaah ke saath doosare poojy, to donon ko phenk do, kadee yaatana mein.
50|27|usake saathee (shaitaan) ne kahaah he hamaare paalanahaar! mainne ise kupath nahin kiya, parantu, vah svayan door ke kupath mein tha.
50|28|allaah ne kahaah jhagada na karo mere paas. mainne to pahale hee (sansaar mein) tumhaaree or chetaavanee bhej dee thee.
50|29|nahin badalee jaatee baat mere paas[1] aur na main tanik bhee atyaachaaree hoon bhakton ke lie.
50|30|jis din ham kahenge narak se ki too bhar gayee? aur vah kahegee kya kuchh aur hai
50|31|tatha sameep kar dee jaayegee svarg, vah sadaachaariyon se kuchh door na hogee.
50|32|ye hai jisaka tumhen vachan diya jaata tha, pratyek dhyaanamagn rakshak[1] ke lie.
50|33|jo dara atyant krpaasheel se bin dekhe tatha lekar aaya dhyaanamagn dil.
50|34|pravesh kar jao isamen, shaanti ke saath. ye sadaiv rahane ka din hai.
50|35|unheen ke lie, jo ve ichchha karenge usamen milega tatha hamaare paas (isase bhee) adhik hai.
50|36|tatha ham vinaash kar chuke hain inase poorv, bahut-se samudaayon ka, jo inase adhik the shakti mein. to ve phirate rahe nagaron mein, to kya kaheen koee bhaagane kee jagah pa sake
50|37|vaastav mein, isamen nishchay shiksha hai usake lie, jisake dil hon athava kaan dhare aur vah upasthit[1] ho.
50|38|tatha nishchay hamane paida kiya hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ko aur jo kuchh donon ke beech hai, chhah dinon mein aur hamen koee thakaan nahin huee.
50|39|to aap sahan karen unakee baaton ko tatha pavitrata ka varnan karen apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath, soory ke nikalane se pahale tatha doobane se pahale.
50|40|tatha raat ke kuchh bhaag mein usakee pavitrata ka varnan karen aur sajdon (namaazon) ke pashchaat (bhee).
50|41|tatha dhyaan se suno, jis din pukaarane vaala[1] pukaarega sameep sthaan se.
50|42|jis din sab sunenge kadee aavaaz saty ke saath, vahee nikalane ka din hoga.
50|43|vaastav mein, ham hee jeevan dete tatha maarate hain aur hamaaree or hee phirakar aana hai.
50|44|jis din phat jaayegee dharatee unase, ve daudate hue (nikalenge), ye ekatr karana hamapar bahut saral hai.
50|45|tatha ham bhalee-bhaanti jaanate hain use, jo kuchh ve kar rahe hain aur aap unhen balapoorvak manavaane ke lie nahin hain. to aap shiksha den quraan dvaara use, jo darata ho meree yaatana se.
51|1|shapath hai (baadalon ko) bikherane vaaliyon kee
51|2|phir (baadalon ka) bojh laadane vaaliyon kee
51|3|phir dheemee gati se chalane vaaliyon kee
51|4|phir (allaah ka) aadesh baantane vaale (farishton kee)
51|5|nishchay jis (pralay) se tumhen daraaya ja raha hai, vah sachchee hai.
51|6|tatha karmon ka phal avashy milane vaala hai.
51|7|shapath hai raaston vaale aakaash kee
51|8|vaastav mein, tum vibhinn[1] baaton mein ho.
51|9|usase vahee pher diya jaata hai, jo (saty se) phira hua ho.
51|10|naash kar diye gaye anumaan lagaane vaale.
51|11|jo apanee achetana mein bhoole hue hain.
51|12|ve prashn[1] karate hain ki pratikaar ka din kab hai
51|13|(us din hai) jis din vah agni par tapaaye jaayenge.
51|14|(unase kaha jaayegaah) svaad chakho apane upadrav ka. yahee vah hai, jisakee tum sheeghr maang kar rahe the.
51|15|vaastav mein, aagyaakaaree svargon tatha jal sroton mein honge.
51|16|lete hue jo kuchh pradaan kiya hai unahen, unake paalanahaaran ne. vastutah, ve isase pahale (sansaar mein) sadaachaaree the.
51|17|ve raatri mein bahut kam soya karate the.
51|18|tatha bhoron[1] mein kshama maangate the.
51|19|aur unake dhanon mein maangane vaale[1] tatha na paane vaale ka haqa tha.
51|20|tatha dharatee mein bahut-see nishaaniyaan hain vishvaas karane vaalon ke lie.
51|21|tatha svayan tumhaare bheetar (bhee). phir kyon tum dekhate nahin
51|22|aur aakaash mein tumhaaree jeevika[1] hai tatha jisaka tumhen vachan diya ja raha hai.
51|23|to shapath hai aakaash evan dharatee ke paalanahaar kee! ye (baat) aise hee sach hai, jaise tum bol rahe ho.
51|24|(he nabee!) kya aayee aapake paas ibraaheem ke sammaanit atithiyon kee soochana
51|25|jab ve aaye usake paas, to salaam kiya. ibraaheem ne (bhee) salaam kiya (tatha kahaah) aparichit log hain.
51|26|phir chupake se apane parijanon kee or gaya aur ek mota (bhuna hua) bachhada laaya.
51|27|phir rakh diya unake paas, usane kahaah tum kyon nahin khaate ho
51|28|phir apane dil mein unase kuchh dara, unhonne kahaah daro nahin aur use shubh soochana dee ek gyaanee putr kee.
51|29|to saamane aayee usakee patnee aur usane maar liya (aashchary se) apane munh par haath tatha kahaah main baanjh budhiya hoon.
51|30|unhonne kahaah isee prakaar, tere paalanahaar ne kaha hai. vaastav mein, vah sab gun aur sab kuchh jaanane vaala hai.
51|31|us (ibraaheem) ne kahaah to tumhaara kya abhiyaan hai, he bheje hue (farishto)
51|32|unhonne kahaah vaastav mein, ham bheje gaye hain ek apareedhee jaati kee or.
51|33|taaki ham barasaayen unapar patthar kee kankaree.
51|34|naamaankit[1] tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se ullanghanakaariyon ke lie.
51|35|phir hamane nikaal diya jo bhee us (bastee) mein eemaan vaale the.
51|36|aur hamane usamen mominon ka keval ek hee ghar[1] paaya.
51|37|tatha chhod dee hamane us (bastee) mein ek nishaanee unake lie, jo darate hon duhkhadaayee yaatana se.
51|38|tatha moosa (kee katha) mein, jab hamane bheja use firaun kee or pratyaksh (khule) pramaan ke saath.
51|39|to vah vimukh ho gaya apane bal-boote ke kaaran aur kah diya ki jaadoogar athava paagal hai.
51|40|antatah, hamane pakad liya usako tatha usakee senaon ko, phir phenk diya unhen saagar mein aur vah nindit hokar rah gaya.
51|41|tatha aad mein (shikshaaprad nishaanee hai). jab hamane bhej dee unapar baanjh[1] aandhee.
51|42|vah nahin chhodatee thee kisee vastu ko jisapar guzaratee, parantu use bana detee thee jeern choor-choor haddee ke samaan.
51|43|tatha samood mein jab unase kaha gaya ki laabhaanvit ho lo, ek nishchit samay tak.
51|44|to unhonne avagya kee apane paalanahaar ke aadesh kee, to sahasa pakad liya unhen kadak ne aur ve dekhate rah gaye.
51|45|to ve na khade ho sake aur na (hamase) badala le sake.
51|46|tatha nooh[1] kee jaati ko isase pahale (yaad karo). vaastav mein, ve avagyaakaaree jaati the.
51|47|tatha aakaash ko hamane banaaya hai haathon[1] se aur ham nishchay vistaar karane vaale hain.
51|48|tatha dharatee ko hamane bichhaaya hai, to ham kya[1] hee achchhe bichhaane vaale hain.
51|49|tatha pratyek vastu ko hamane utpann kiya hai joda, taaki tum shiksha grahan karo.
51|50|to tum daudo allaah kee or, vaastav mein, main tumhen usakee or se pratyaksh roop se (khula) saavadhaan kar ne vaala hoon.
51|51|aur mat banao allaah ke saath koee doosara poojy. vaastav mein, main tumhen isase khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon.
51|52|isee prakaar nahin aaya unake paas jo in (makka vaasiyon) se poorv rahe koee rasool, parantu unhonne kaha ki jaadoogar ya paagal hai.
51|53|kya ve ek-doosare ko vasiyyat[1] kar chuke hain isakee? balki ve ullanghanakaaree log hain.
51|54|to aap mukh pher len unase. aapakee koee ninda nahin hai.
51|55|aur aap shiksha dete rahen. isalie ki shiksha laabhaprad hai imaan vaalon ke lie.
51|56|aur nahin utpann kiya hai mainne jinn tatha manushy ko, parantu taaki meree hee ibaadat karen.
51|57|main nahin chaahata hoon unase koee jeevika aur na chaahata hoon ki ve mujhe khilaayen.
51|58|avashy allaah hee jeevika daata, shaktishaalee, balavaan hai.
51|59|to in atyaachaariyon ke paap hain inake saathiyon ke paapon ke samaan, atah utaavale na banen.
51|60|antatah, vinaash hai kaafiron ke lie unake us din[1] se, jisase he daraaye ja rahe hain.
52|1|shapath hai toor[1] (parvat) kee
52|2|aur likhee huee pustak[1] kee
52|3|jo jhillee ke khule pannon mein likhee huee hai.
52|4|tatha baitul maamoor (aabaad[1] ghar) kee
52|5|tatha oonchee chhat (aakaash) kee
52|6|aur bhadakaaye hue saagar[1] kee
52|7|vastutah, aapake paalanahaar kee yaatana hokar rahegee.
52|8|nahin hai use koee rokane vaala.
52|9|jis din aakaash dagamagaayega.
52|10|tatha parvat chalenge.
52|11|to vinaash hai us din, jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie.
52|12|jo vivaad mein khel rahe hain.
52|13|jis din ve dhakka diye jaayenge narak kee agni kee or.
52|14|(unase kaha jaayegaah) yahee vah narak hai, jise tum jhuthala rahe the.
52|15|to kya ye jaadoo hai ya tumhen sujhaee nahin deta
52|16|isamen pravesh kar jao, phir sahan karo ya sahan na karo, tumapar samaan hai. tum usee ka badala diye ja rahe ho, jo tum kar rahe the.
52|17|nishchay, aagyaakaaree baagon tatha sukhon mein honge. prasann hokar usase, jo pradaan kiya hoga unhen unake paalanahaar ne tatha bacha lega unhen, unaka paalanahaar narak kee yaatana se.
52|18|prasann hokar usase, jo pradaan kiya hai unahen unake paalanahaar ne tatha bacha lega unahen unaka paalanahaar narak kee yaatana se.
52|19|(unase kaha jaayegaah) khao aur piyo manamaanee, usake badale mein, jo tum kar rahe the.
52|20|takiye lagaaye hue honge takhton par baraabar bichhe hue tatha ham vivaah denge unako badee aankhon vaalee striyon se.

52|21|aur jo log eemaan laaye aur anusaran kiya unaka, unakee santaan ne eemaan ke saath, to hm mila denge unakee santaan ko unake saath tatha nahin kam karenge unake karmon mein se kuchh, pratyek vyakti apane karmon ka bandhak[1] hai.
52|22|tatha adhik denge unhen meve tatha maans jisakee ve roochi rakhenge.
52|23|ve ek-doosare se usamen lete rahenge madira ke pyaale, jisamen na koee vyarth baat hogee, na koee paap kee baat.
52|24|aur phirate rahenge unakee seva mein (sundar) baalak, jaise vah chhupaaye hue motee hon.
52|25|aur ve (svarg vaasee) sammukh honge ek-doosare ke prashn karate hue.
52|26|ve kahengeh isase poorv[1] ham apane parijanon mein darate the.
52|27|to allaah ne upakaar kiya hamapar tatha hamen surakshit kar diya taapalaharee kee yaatana se.
52|28|isase poorv[1] ham vandana kiya karate the usakee. nishchay vah ati paropakaaree, dayaavaan hai.
52|29|to aap shiksha dete rahen. kyonki aapake paalanahaar kee anugrah se na aap kaahin (jyotishi) hain aur na paagal.
52|30|kya ve kahate hain ki ye kavi hain, ham prateeksha kar rahe hain usake saath kaalachakr kee
52|31|aap kah den ki tum prateeksha karate raho, main (bhee) tumhaare saath prateeksha karata hoon.
52|32|kya unhen sikhaatee hain unakee samajh ye baaten athava vah ullanghanakaaree log hain
52|33|kya ve kahate hain ki is (nabee) ne is (quraan) ko svayan bana liya hai? vaastav mein, ve eemaan laana nahin chaahate.
52|34|to ve le aayen is (quraan) ke samaan koee ek baat, yadi ve sachche hain.
52|35|kya ve paida ho gaye hain bina[1] kisee ke paida kiye athava ve svayan paida karane vaale hain
52|36|ya unhonne hee utpatti kee hai aakaashon tatha dharatee kee? vaastav mein, ve vishvaas hee nahin rakhate.
52|37|athava unake paas aapake paalanahaar ke koshaagaar hain ya vahee (usake) adhikaaree hain
52|38|athava unake paas koee seedhee hai, jise lagaakar sunate[1] hain? to unaka sunane vaala koee khula pramaan prastut kare.
52|39|kya allaah ke lie putriyaan hon tumhaare lie putr hon.
52|40|ya aap maang kar rahe hain unase kisee paarishramik[1] kee, to ve usake bojh se dabe ja rahe hain
52|41|athava unake paas paroksh (ka gyaan) hai, jise ve likh[1] rahe hain
52|42|ya ve chaahate hain koee chaal chalana? to jo kaafir ho gaye, ve us chaal mein grast honge.
52|43|athava unaka koee or upaasy (poojy) hai allaah ke siva? allaah pavitr hai unake shirk se.
52|44|yadi ve dekh len koee khand aakaash se girata hua, to kahenge ki tah par tah baadal hai.
52|45|atah, aap chhod den unhen, yahaan tak ki ve mil jaayen apane us din se, jisamen[1] inhen apanee sudhd nahin hogee.
52|46|us din nahin kaam aayegee unake, unakee chaal kuchh aur na unakee sahaayata kee jaayegee.
52|47|tatha nishchay atyaachaariyon ke lie ek yaatana hai isake atirikt[1] (bhee). parantu, unamen se adhiktar gyaan nahin rakhate hain.

52|48|aur (he nabee!) aap sahan karen apane paalanahaar ka aadesh aane tak. vaastav mein, aap hamaaree raksha mein hain tatha pavitrata ka varnan karen apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath jab jaagate hon.
52|49|tatha raatree mein (bhee) usakee pavitrata ka varnan karen aur taaron ke doobane ke[1] pashchaat (bhee).
53|1|shapath hai taare kee, jab vah doobane lage
53|2|nahin kupath hua hai tumhaara saathee aur na kumaarg hua hai.
53|3|aur vah nahin bolate apanee ichchha se.
53|4|vah to bas vahyee (prakaashana) hai. jo (unakee or) kee jaatee hai.
53|5|sikhaaya hai jise unhen shaktivaan ne.
53|6|bade balashaalee ne, phir vah seedha khada ho gaya.
53|7|tatha vah aakaash ke ooparee kinaare par tha.
53|8|phir sameep hua aur phir latak gaya.
53|9|phir ho gaya do kamaan ke baraabar athava usase bhee sameep.
53|10|phir usane vahyee kee us (allaah) ke bhakt[1] kee or, jo bhee vahyee kee.
53|11|nahin jhuthalaaya unake dil ne, jo kuchh unhonne dekha.
53|12|to kya tum unase jhagadate ho usapar, jise ve (aankhon se) dekhate hain
53|13|nihsandeh, unhonne use ek baar aur bhee utarate dekha.
53|14|sid-ratul munha[1] ke paas.
53|15|jisake paas jannatul[1] maava hai.
53|16|jab sid-rah par chha raha tha, jo kuchh chha raha tha.
53|17|na to nigaah chundhiyaee aur na seema se aage huee.
53|18|nishchay aapane apane paalanahaar kee badee nishaaniyaan dekheen.
53|19|to (he mushriko!) kya tumane dekh liya laatt tatha uzza ko.
53|20|tatha ek teesare manaat ko
53|21|kya tumhaare lie putr hain aur us allaah ke lie putriyaan
53|22|ye to bada bhonda vibhaajan hai.

53|23|vaastav mein, ye kuchh keval naam hain, jo tumane tatha tumhaare poorvajon ne rakh liye hain. nahin utaara hai allaah ne unaka koee pramaan. ve keval anumaan[1] par chal rahe hain tatha apanee manamaanee par. jabaki aa chuka hai unake paalanahaar kee or se maargadarshan.
53|24|kya manushy ko vahee mil jaayega, jisakee vah kaamana kare
53|25|(nahin, ye baat nahin hai) kyonki allaah ke adhikaar mein hai aakhirat (paralok) tatha sansaar.
53|26|aur aakaashon mein bahut-se farishte hain, jinakee anushansa kuchh laabh nahin detee, parantu isake pashchaat ki anumati de allaah jisake lie chaahe tatha usase prasann ho.
53|27|vaastav mein, jo eemaan nahin laate paralok par, ve naam dete hain farishton ke, striyon ke naam.
53|28|unhen isaka koee gyaan nahin. ve anusaran kar rahe hain maatr gumaan ka aur vastutah gumaan nahin laabhaprad hota saty ke saamane kuchh bhee.
53|29|atah, aap vimukh ho jaayen usase, jisane munh pher liya hai hamaaree shiksha se tatha vah saansaarik jeevan hee chaahata hai.
53|30|yahee unake gyaan kee pahunch hai. vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee adhik jaanata hai use, jo kupath ho gaya usake maarg se tatha use, jisane sammaarg apana liya.
53|31|tatha allaah hee ka hai jo aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai, taaki vah badala de use, jisane buraee kee usake kukarm ka aur badala de use, jisane sukarm kiya achchha badala.

53|32|un logon ko jo bachate hain maha paapon tatha nirlajja[1] se, kuchh chook ke siva. vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar udaar, kshamaasheel hai. vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai tumhen, jabaki usane paida kiya tumhen dharatee[2] se tatha jab tum bhrun the apanee maataon ke garbh mein. atah, apane mein pavitr na bano. vahee bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai use, jisane sadaachaar kiya hai.
53|33|to kya aapane use dekha jisane munh pher liya
53|34|aur tanik daan kiya phir ruk gaya.
53|35|kya usake paas paroksh ka gyaan hai ki vah (sab kuchh) dekh[1] raha hai
53|36|kya use soochana nahin huee un baaton kee, jo moosa ke granthon mein hain
53|37|aur ibraaheem kee, jisane (apana vachan) poora kar diya.
53|38|ki koee doosare ka bhaar nahin laadega.
53|39|aur ye ki manushy ke lie vahee hai, jo usane prayaas kiya.
53|40|aur ye ki usaka prayaas sheeghr dekha jaayega.
53|41|phir pratiphal diya jaayega use poora pratiphal.
53|42|aur ye ki aapake paalanahaar kee or hee (sabako) pahunchana hai.
53|43|tatha vahee hai, jisane (sansaar mein) hansaaya tatha rulaaya.
53|44|tatha useene maara aur jivaaya.
53|45|tatha useene donon prakaar utpann kiye; nar aur naaree.
53|46|veery se, jab (garbhaashay mein) gira.
53|47|tatha usee ke oopar doosaree baar[1] utpann karana hai.

57|10|aur kya kaaran hai ki tum vyay nahin karate allaah kee raah mein, jabaki allaah hee ke lie hai aakaashon aur dharatee ka uttaraadhikaar. nahin baraabar ho sakate tumamen se ve jinhonne daan kiya (makka) kee vijay se pahale tatha dharmayudhd kiya. vahee log pad mein adhik oonche hain unase, jinhonne daan kiya usake pashchaat[1] tatha dharmayudhd kiya tatha pratyek ko allaah ne vachan diya hai bhalaee ka tatha allaah jo kuchh tum karate ho, usase poornatah soochit hai.
57|11|kaun hai, jo rn de allaah ko achchha rn? jise vah duguna kar de usake lie aur usee ke lie achchha pratidaan hai.

57|12|jis din tum dekhoge eemaan vaalon tatha eemaan vaaliyon ko ki daud raha[1] hoga unaka prakaash unake aage tatha unake daayen. tumhen shubh soochana hai aise svargon kee, bahatee hain jinamen naharen, jinamen tum sadaavaasee hoge, vahee badee saphalata hai.

57|13|jis din kahenge munaafiq purush tatha munaafiq striyaan unase, jo eemaan laaye ki hamaaree prateeksha karo, ham praapt kar len tumhaare prakaash mein se kuchh. unase kaha jaayegaah tum peechhe vaapas jao aur prakaash kee khoj karo.[1] phir bana dee jaayegee unake beech ek deevaar, jisamen ek dvaar hoga. usake bheetar daya hogee tatha usake baahar yaatana hogee.

57|14|ve unhen pukaarengeh kya ham (sansaar mein) tumhaare saath nahin the? (ve kahengeh) parantu tumane upadrav mein daal diya apane aapako aur prateeksha[1] mein rahe tatha sandeh kiya aur dhokhe mein rakha tumhen tumhaaree kaamanaon ne. yahaan tak ki aa pahuncha allaah ka aadesh aur dhokhe hee mein rakha tumhen bade vanchak (shaitaan) ne.
57|15|to aaj tumase koee arthadand nahin liya jaayega aur na kaafiron se. tumhaara aavaas narak hai, vahee tumhaare yogy hai aur vah bura nivaas hai.

57|16|kya samay nahin aaya eemaan vaalon ke lie ki jhuk jaayen unake dil allaah ke smaran (yaad) ke lie tatha jo utara hai saty aur na ho jaayen unake samaan, jinhen pradaan kee gayeen pustaken isase poorv, phir lambee avadhi vyateet ho gayee unapar, to kathor ho gaye unake dil[1] tatha unamen adhiktar avagyaakaaree hain.
57|17|jaan lo ki allaah hee jeevit karata hai dharatee ko, usake maran ke pashchaat, hamane ujaagar kar dee hain tumhaare lie nishaaniyaan, taaki tum samajho.
57|18|vastutah, daan karane vaale purush tatha daan karane vaalee striyaan tatha jinhonne rn diya hai allaah ko achchha rn,[1] use badhaaya jaayega unake lie aur unheen ke lie achchha pratidaan hai.

57|19|tatha jo eemaan laaye allaah aur usake rasoolon[1] par, vahee siddeeq tatha shaheed[2] hain apane paalanahaar ke sameep. unheen ke lie unaka pratiphal tatha unakee divya jyoti hai aur jo kaafir ho gaye aur jhthalaaya hamaaree aayaton ko, to vahee naarakeey hain.

57|20|jaan lo ki saansaarik jeevan ek khel, manoranjan, shobha,[1] aapas mein garv tatha ek-doosare se badh jaane ka prayaas hai, dhanon tatha santaan mein. us varsha ke samaan bha gayee kisaanon ko jisakee upaj, phir vah pak gayee, to tum use dekhane lage peelee, phir vah ho jaatee hai choor-choor aur paralok mein kadee yaatana hai tatha allaah kee kshama aur prasannata hai aur saansaarik jeevan to bas dhokhe ka sansaadhan hai.

57|21|ek-doosare se aage badho apane paalanahaar kee kshama tatha us svarg kee or, jisaka vistaar aakaash tatha dharatee ke vistaar ke[1] samaan hai. jo taiyaar kee gayee hai unake lie, jo eemaan laayen allaah aur usake rasoolon par. ye allaah ka anugrah hai, vah pradaan karata hai use, jise chaahata hai aur allaah bada udaar (dayaasheel) hai.
57|22|nahin pahunchatee koee aapada dharatee mein aur na tumhaare praanon mein, parantu vah ek pustak mein likhee hai, isase poorv kee ham use utpann karen[1] aur ye allaah ke lie ati saral hai.
57|23|taaki tum shok na karo usapar, jo tumase kho jaaye aur na itarao usapar, jo tumhen pradaan kiya hai aur allaah prem nahin karata kisee itaraan, garv karane vaale se.
57|24|jo kanjoosee karate hain aur aadesh dete hain logon ko kanjoosee karane ka tatha jo vimukh hoga, to nishchay allaah nisprh, saraahaneey hai.

57|25|nihsandeh, hamane bheja hai apane rasoolon ko khule pramaanon ke saath tatha utaaree hai unake saath pustak tatha tula (nyaay ka niyam), taaki log sthit rahen nyaay par tatha hamane utaara loha jisamen bada bal[1] hai tatha logon ke lie bahut-se laabh aur taaki allaah jaan le ki kaun usakee sahaayata karata hai tatha usake rasoolon kee, bina dekhe. vastutah, allaah ati shaktishaalee, prabhaavashaalee hai.

57|26|hamane (rasool banaakar) bheja nooh ko tatha ibraaheem ko aur rakh dee unakee santati mein nabuvat (dutatv) tatha pustak. to unamen se kuchh ne maargadarshan apanaaya aur unamen se bahut-se avagyaakaaree hain.

57|27|phir hamane, nirantar unake pashchaat apane rasool bheje aur unake pashchaat bheja maryam ke putr eesa ko tatha pradaan kee use injeel aur kar diya usaka anusaran karane vaalon ke dilon mein karuna tatha daya aur sansaar[1] tyaag ko unhonne svayan bana liya, hamane nahin anivaary kiya use unake oopar. parantu allaah kee prasannata ke lie (unhonne aisa kiya), to unhonne nahin kiya usaka poorn paalan. phir (bhee) hamane pradaan kiya unhen jo eemaan laaye unamen se unaka badala aur unamen se adhiktar avagyaakaaree hain.

57|28|he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! allaah se daro aur eemaan lao usake rasool par, vah tumhen pradaan karega dohaara[1] pratiphal apanee daya se tatha pradaan karega tumhen aisa prakaash, jisake saath tum chaloge tatha kshama kar dega tumhen aur allaah ati kshamee, dayaavaan hai.

57|29|taaki gyaan ho jaaye in baaton se ahle[1] kitaab ko ki vah kuchh shakti nahin rakhate allaah ke anugrah par aur ye ki anugrah allaah hee ke haath mein hai. vah pradaan karata hai, jise chaahe aur allaah bade anugrah vaala hai.

58|1|(he nabee!) allaah ne sun lee hai us stree kee baat, jo aapase jhagad rahee thee apane pati ke vishay mein tatha guhaar rahee thee allaah ko aur allaah sun raha tha tum donon ka vaartaalaap, vaastav mein, vah sab kuchh sunane-dekhane vaala hai.

58|2|jo zihaar[1] karate hain tumamen se apanee patniyon se, to ve unakee maan nahin hain. unakee maan to ve hain, jinhonne unahen janm diya hai aur vah bolate hain apriy tatha jhoothee baat aur vaastav mein allaah maaf karane vaala, kshamaasheel hai.

58|3|aur jo zihaar kar lete hain apanee patniyon se, phir vaapas lena chaahate hain apanee baat, to (usaka dand) ek daas mukt karana hai, isase poorv ki ek-doosare ko haath lagaayen.[1] iseekee tumhen shiksha dee ja rahee hai aur allaah usase jo tum karate ho, bhalee-bhaanti soochit hai.

58|4|phir jo (daas) na paaye, to do maheene nirantar roza (vrat) rakhana hai, isase poorv kee ek-doosare ko haath lagaaye. phir jo sakat na rakhe, to saath nirdhanon ko bhojan karaana hai. ye aadesh isalie hai, taaki tum eemaan lao allaah tatha usake rasool par aur ye allaah kee seemaayen hain tatha kaafiron ke lie duhkhadaayee yaatana hai.

58|5|vaastav mein, jo virodh karate hain allaah tatha usake rasool ka, ve apamaanit kar diye jaayenge, jaise apamaanit kar diye gaye, jo inase poorv hue aur hamane utaar dee hain khulee aayaten aur kaafiron ke lie apamaanakaaree yaatana hai.
58|6|jis din jeevit karega un sab ko allaah, to unhen soochit kar dega unake karmon se. gin rakha hai use allaah ne aur vah bhool gaye hain use aur allah pratyek vastu par gavaah hai.

58|7|kya aapane nahin dekha ki allaah jaanata hai, jo (bhee) aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai? nahin hotee kisee teen kee kaana-phoosee, parantu vah unaka chautha hota hai aur na paanch kee, parantu vah unaka chhatha hota hai aur na isase kam kee aur na isase adhik kee, parantu vah unake saath hota[1] hai, ve jahaan bhee hon. phir vah unhen soochit kar dega unake karmon se pralay ke din. vaastav mein, allaah pratyek vastu se bhalee-bhaanti avagat hai.

58|8|kya aapane nahin dekha unhen, jo roke gaye hain kaana-phoosee[1] se? phir (bhee) vahee karate hain jisase roke gaye hain tatha kaana-phoosee karate hain paap aur atyaachaar tatha rasool kee avagya kee aur ve jab aapake paas aate hain, to aapako aise (shabd se) salaam karate hain, jisase aapapar salaam nahin bheja allaah ne tatha kahate hain apane manon mein: kyon allaah hamen yaatana nahin deta usapar jo ham kahate[1] hain? paryaapt hai unhen narak, jisamen ve pravesh karenge, to bura hai unaka thikaana.

58|9|he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! jab tum kaana-phoosee karo, to kaana-phoosee na karo paap tatha atyaachaar evan rasool kee avagya kee aur kaana phoosee karo puny tatha sadaachaar kee aur darate raho allaah se, jisakee or hee tum ekatr kiye jooge.

58|10|vaastav mein, kaana-phoosee shaitaanee kaam hain, taaki vo udaaseen hon,[1] jo eemaan laaye. jabaki nahin hai vah haanikar unhen kuchh, parantu allaah kee anumati se aur allaah hee par chaahiye ki bharosa karen eemaan vaale.

58|11|he eemaan vaalo! jab tumase kaha jaaye ki vistaar kar do apanee sabhaon mein, to vistaar[1] kar do, vistaar kar dega allaah tumhaare lie tatha jab kaha jaaye ki sukad jao, to sukad jao. ooncha[2] kar dega allaah unhen, jo eemaan laaye hain tumamen se tatha jinhen gyaan pradaan kiya gaya hai, kaee shreniyaan tatha allaah usase jo tum karate ho, bhalee-bhaanti avagat hai.

58|12|he eemaan vaalo! jab tum akele baat karo rasool se, to baat karane se pahale kuchh daan karo.[1] ye tumhaare lie uttam tatha adhik pavitr hai. phir yadi tum (daan ke lie kuchh) na pao, to allaah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai.

58|13|kya tum (is aadesh se) dar gaye ki ekaant mein baat karane se pahale kuchh daan kar do? phir jab tumane aisa nahin kiya, to sthaapana karo namaaz kee tatha zakaat do aur aagya paalan karo allaah tatha usake rasool kee aur allaah soochit hai usase, jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho.
58|14|kya aapane unhen dekha[1] jinhonne mitr bana liya us samudaay ko, jisapar krodhit ho gaya allaah? na ve tumhaare hain aur na unake aur ve shapath lete hain jhoothee baat par, jaan-boojh kar.
58|15|taiyaar kee hai allaah ne unake lie kadee yaatana, vaastav mein, vah bura hai, jo ve kar rahe hain.

58|19|chha[1] gaya hai unapar shaitaan aur bhula dee hai unhen allaah kee yaad. yahee shaitaan kee sena hai. sun lo! shaitaan kee sena hee kshatigrast hone vaalee hai.
58|20|vaastav mein, jo virodh karate hain allaah tatha usake rasool ka, vahee apamaaniton mein se hain.

58|22|aap nahin paayenge unhen, jo eemaan rakhate hon allaah tatha ant-divas (pralay) par ki ve maitree karate hon unase, jinhonne virodh kiya allaah aur usake rasool ka, chaahe ve unake pita hon, unake putr, unake bhaee athava unake parijan[1] hon. vahee hain, likh diya hai (allaah ne) jinake dilon mein eemaan aur samarthan diya hai jinhen apanee or se rooh (aatma) dvaara tatha pravesh dega unhen aise svargon mein, bahatee hain jinamen naharen, ve sadaavaasee honge jinamen. prasann ho gaya allaah unase tatha ve prasann ho gaye usase. vah allaah ka samooh hai. sun lo, allaah ka samooh hee saphal hone vaala hai.
59|1|allaah kee pavitrata ka gaan kiya hai usane, jo bhee aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai aur vah prabhutvashaalee, gunee hai.

59|3|aur yadi allaah ne na likh diya hota un (ke bhaagy mein) desh nikaala, to unhen yaatana de deta sansaar (hee) mein tatha unake lie akhirat (paralok) mein narak kee yaatana hai.

59|5|(he musalamaano!) tumane nahin kaata[1] koee khajoor ka vrksh aur na chhoda use khada apane tane par, parantu ye sab allaah ke aadesh se hua aur taaki vah apamaanit kare pathabhrashton ko.

59|6|aur jo dhan dila diya allaah ne apane rasool ko unase, to nahin daudaaye tumane usake lie ghode aur na oont. parantu allaah prabhutv pradaan kar deta hai apane rasool ko, jisapar chaahata hai tatha allaah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai.

59|7|allaah ne jo dhan dilaaya hai apane rasool ko is bastee vaalon[1] se, vah allaah, rasool, (aapake) sameepavartiyon, anaathon, nirdhanon tatha yaatriyon ke lie hai; taaki vah (dhan) phirata na rah[2] jaaye tumhaare dhanavaanon ke beech aur jo pradaan kar de rasool, tum use le lo aur rok den tumhen jisase, tum usase ruk jao tatha allaah se darate raho, nishchay allaah kadee yaatana dene vaala hai.

59|8|un nirdhan muhaajiron ke lie hai, jo nikaal diye gaye apane gharon tatha dhanon se. ve chaahate hain allaah ka anugrah tatha prasannata aur sahaayata karate hain allaah tatha usake rasool kee, yahee sachche hain.

59|9|tatha un logon[1] ke lie (bhee), jinhonne aavaas bana liya is ghar (madeena) ko tatha un (muhaajiron ke aane) se pahale eemaan laaye, ve prem karate hain unase, jo hijarat karake aa gaye unake yahaan aur ve nahin paate apane dilon mein koee aavashyakta usakee, jo unhen diya jaaye aur praathamikta dete hain doosaron ko apane oopar, chaahe svayan bhookhe[1] hon aur jo bacha liye gaye apane man kee tangee se, to vahee saphal hone vaale hain.

59|10|aur jo aaye unake pashchaat, ve kahate hain: he hamaare paalanahaar! hamen kshama kar de tatha hamaare un bhaeeyon ko, jo hamase pahale eemaan laaye aur na rakh hamaare dilon mein koee bair unake lie, jo eemaan laaye. he hamaare paalanahaar! too ati karunaamay, dayaavaan hai.

59|11|kya aapane unhen[1] nahin dekha, jo munaafiq (avasaravaadee) ho gaye aur kahate hain apane ahle kitaab bhaeeyon se ki yadi tumhen desh nikaala diya gaya, to ham avashy nikal jaayenge tumhaare saath aur nahin maanenge tumhaare baare mein kisee kee (baat) kabhee aur yadi tumase yudhd hua to ham avashy tumhaaree sahaayata karenge tatha allaah gavaah hai ki ve jhoothe hain.

59|12|yadi ve nikaale gaye to ye unake saath nahin nikalenge aur yadi unase yudhd ho, to ve unakee sahaayata nahin karenge aur yadi unakee sahaayata kee (bhee,) to avashy peeth dikha denge, phir kaheen se koee sahaayata nahin paayenge.

59|23|vah allaah hee hai, jisake atirikt nahin hai[1] koee sachcha vandaneey. vah sabaka svaamee, atyant pavitr, sarvatha shaanti pradaan karane vaala, rakshak, prabhaavashaalee, shaktishaalee bal poorvak aadesh laagoo karane vaala, badaee vaala hai. pavitr hai allaah usase, jise ve (usaka) saajhee banaate hain.

60|1|he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! mere shatruon tatha apane shatruon ko mitr ne banao. tum sandesh bhejate ho unakee or maitree[1] ka, jabaki unhonne kufr kiya hai usaka, jo tumhaare paas saty aaya hai. ve desh nikaala dete hain rasool ko tatha tumako is kaaran ki tum eemaan laaye ho allaah, apane paalanahaar par? yadi tum nikale ho jihaad ke lie meree raah mein aur meree prasannata kee khoj ke lie, to gupt roop se unhen maitree ka sandesh bhejate ho? jabaki main bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hoon use, jo tum chhupaate ho aur jo khulakar karate ho? tatha jo karega aisa, to nishchay vah kupath ho gaya seedhee raah se.
60|2|aur yadi vash mein pa jaayen tumhen, to tumhaare shatru ban jaayen tatha tumhen apane haathon aur zubaanon se duhkh pahunchaayen aur chaahane lagenge ki tum (phir) kaafir ho jao.
60|3|tumhen laabh nahin denge tumhaare sambandhee aur na tumhaaree santaan pralay ke din. vah (allaah) alagaav kar dega tumhaare beech aur allaah jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho, use dekh raha hai.

60|4|tumhaare lie ibraaheem tatha usake saathiyon mein ek achchha aadarsh hai. jabaki unhonne apanee jaati se kahaah nishchay ham virakt hain tumase tatha unase, jinakee tum ibaadat (vandana) karate ho allaah ke atirikt. hamane tumase kufr kiya. khul chuka hai bair hamaare tatha tumhaare beech aur krodh sada ke lie. jab tak tum eemaan na lao akele allaah par, parantu ibraaheem ka (ye) kathan apane pita se ki main avashy tere lie kshama kee praarthana[1] karoonga aur main nahin adhikaar rakhata hoon allaah ke samaksh kuchh. he hamaare paalanahaar! hamane tere hee oopar bharosa kiya aur teree hee or dhyaan kiya hai aur teree hee or phir aana hai.
